pages.text: Every cobblestone variant can be washed ($(thing)Encased Fan$() behind Water) for a chance to produce various small ore pieces native to that rock type.$(br2)Only $(thing)Metal$() and $(thing)Redstone$() ores can be found in this manner, with ore yield rates relative to the commonality of the ore in the rock type.$(br2)$(l:the_world/ores_and_minerals)More information on ores here.$()

$(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rocks yield Native Gold, Native Silver, Cassiterite, Bismuthinite, Garnierite, Cinnabar and Cryolite.$(br2)$(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Extrusive$() rocks yield Native Copper, Native Gold and Hematite.$(br2)$(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Metamorphic$() rocks yield Tetrahedrite, Malachite, Sphalerite and Native Silver.$(br2)$(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks yield Malachite, Bismuthinite, Magnetite and Limonite.
